35 static std::string uniqueFileName();
36 
41 class TemporaryFile
42 {
43 public:
44 
46  TemporaryFile(const char* const extension = "");
47 
49  virtual ~TemporaryFile();
50 
52  const std::string& filename() const { return m_filename; }
53 
55  void close() { m_fstream.close(); }
56 
65  void deleteOnDestruct(bool del) { m_delete = del; }
66 
68  void open();
69 
71  template <typename T>
72  std::ostream& operator<< (const T& out) {
73  return (m_fstream << out);
74  }
75 
77  template <typename T>
78  std::istream& operator>> (const T& in) {
79  return (m_fstream >> in);
80  }
81 
82 private:
83 
84  std::string m_filename;
85  std::fstream m_fstream;
86  bool m_delete;
87 
88 }; // class TemporaryFile
